General.Name: LeddarTech Holdings Inc
General.Description: LeddarTech Holdings Inc. provides AI-based fusion and perception software solutions for advanced driver assistance system, autonomous driving, and parking applications in Canada. It offers LeddarVision, a low-level sensor fusion and perception platform for automotive and off-road industrial vehicles. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Quebec, Canada.
General.Address: 4535, boulevard Wilfrid-Hamel, Quebec, QC, Canada, G1P 2J7
